properties.description: The retired boxer has gone into contract to pay $402 million for a 1,000-unit affordable housing portfolio of more than 60 buildings. The multifamily deal for properties concentrated in Upper Manhattan would be one of the city’s biggest this year.

properties.description: Mayweather invested in office landlord 601W Companies’ largest portfolio, a $10 billion collection of 18 buildings spanning 10 million square feet. Neither source would put a dollar figure to the deal, citing a confidentiality agreement.

properties.description: The retired boxer turned real estate investor is partnering with the Nakash family and Eli Gindi to acquire a large stake in the former Versace Mansion, now known as Villa Casa Casuarina.
